feed.title: little pig
feed.subtitle: Self-discipline, in order to the People who love you, also for yourself!

entry.title: 如何让父母远离危害性的网络谣言
(译)ES6 Cool stuffs — A big fat Arrow
what is the cost of lies?
entry.summary: What is the cost of lies? It's not that we'll mistake them for the truth. The real danger is that if we hear enough lies, then we no longer recognize the truth at all. What can we do then? What else is left but to abandon even the hope of truth and content ourselves instead with stories? In these stories, it doesn't matter who the heroes are. All we want to know is: who is to blame?
entry.content: What is the cost of lies? It's not that we'll mistake them for the truth. The real danger is that if we hear enough lies, then we no longer recognize the truth at all. What can we do then? What else is left but to abandon even the hope of truth and content ourselves instead with stories? In these stories, it doesn't matter who the heroes are. All we want to know is: who is to blame?

entry.title: Anki with code
entry.summary: I happened to see an article introducing Anki last week. I suddenly had curious. So, I just want to make good use of this tool. First, download the software, then familiarize with the most basic functions of the software. I feel very good. Later I was thinking, I want to combine "Aurora Word", "Hundred Words", "Anki", so I have the following video.

entry.title: Perseverance
entry.summary:
• Too many children are declared to be the "winner." They have felt  they are unique, and others have said how talented they are,  In this way, it becomes difficult for them to recognize and praise real excellence in some backgrounds.

  • When you are constantly open-minded and have a lot of things involved, you put too much energy into them, so there is no more energy to concentrate on any one thing.

  • We are not glad because we succeed in a certain area, and we succeed because we are already happy.
entry.content:
• Too many children are declared to be the "winner." They have felt  they are unique, and others have said how talented they are,  In this way, it becomes difficult for them to recognize and praise real excellence in some backgrounds.

  • When you are constantly open-minded and have a lot of things involved, you put too much energy into them, so there is no more energy to concentrate on any one thing.

  • We are not glad because we succeed in a certain area, and we succeed because we are already happy.

entry.title: Why do some people like to control others?
entry.summary: I had heard people tell a story like this: When a girl was taking a doctoral degree, she always worried that she couldn’t get it, and she was worried that her favorite tutor would not want her. At that time, her ex-boyfriend tried to comfort her: "Dear You can't take a doctor; you are still a master, don't worry." She felt that her ex-boyfriend could not comfort her. Because she was still very anxious. Later, the demand that let the ex-boyfriend calm her anxiety is growing, and the boyfriend's "incompetence" is getting more and more dissatisfied with her. Finally, she chose to break up with her boyfriend.
entry.content: I had heard people tell a story like this: When a girl was taking a doctoral degree, she always worried that she couldn’t get it, and she was worried that her favorite tutor would not want her. At that time, her ex-boyfriend tried to comfort her: "Dear You can't take a doctor; you are still a master, don't worry." She felt that her ex-boyfriend could not comfort her. Because she was still very anxious. Later, the demand that let the ex-boyfriend calm her anxiety is growing, and the boyfriend's "incompetence" is getting more and more dissatisfied with her. Finally, she chose to break up with her boyfriend.

entry.title: Cereals Brain
entry.summary: In order to stay away from the disease, we follow the so-called healthy diet to consume a lot of gluten and carbohydrates. However, brain and body diseases such as Alzheimer's disease, epilepsy, and anxiety are still raging. Why does this happen?
entry.content: In order to stay away from the disease, we follow the so-called healthy diet to consume a lot of gluten and carbohydrates. However, brain and body diseases such as Alzheimer's disease, epilepsy, and anxiety are still raging. Why does this happen?

entry.title: Someone has exposed BILIBILI backend code on Github
entry.summary: Someone has exposed BILIBILI backend code on Github. I know this thing after one day. When I hear about this, I'm shocked. When people do something like this, either this is a problem with the people's character, or this is a problem with the company. In either case, the ultimate winner of this event is Github. Like 996.icu.
